overview: Following the movie : "Au Lieu". A cinematic reading of the metaphor between the city of Rome and the unconscious, in which Freud introduces Civilization and Its Discontents. "A dream of a place, a stone and of pr√©sence. A photographic pilgrimage from the abandoned stairs of the vineyard of Guebwiller until Rome, Eternal City ..." A self-portrait by photographer Luc Meichler.
title: Conversio At Fantasmata
